name: NetCents
author: NetCents

sections.description:
NetCents WooCommerce plugin provides your customers with a smooth checkout experience to pay using cryptocurrency on your WooCommerce website.

Setup & Installation

Download the plugin and follow the instructions in our knowledge base to connect your website and enable crypto payments.

https://merchant-support.net-cents.com/knowledge/ecommerce-plugin/wordpress
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Updated to work with new widget

1.1.1

  • Performance update

1.1.2

  • Internal mailer

1.1.3

  • Set order status to on hold if order is under paid or over paid. Order will have to be confirmed manually.

1.1.4

  • Update displayed text to be in line with the NetCents platform

1.1.5

  • Update more small text

1.1.6

  • Dynamic endpoint

1.1.7

  • Change to processing status once transaction reaches required confirmations

2.0.0

  • Implements the new hosted payments page. Tested to WordPress 5.2.4 – Include processing status

2.0.1

  • Change up default texts and style image to fit better with themes. Tested to WordPress 5.4.1

2.1.0

  • Use new transactions route

2.1.1

  • Tested up to 5.6.2

2.1.2

  • Tested up to 5.8.1

= 2.1.3
* Fix for automatically completed transaction within payment tolerance threshold

= 2.1.4
* Update automatically completed transactions to processing instead of on hold
